name: R Project
developer_name: The R Project for Statistical Computing

description: RStudio introduced projects in version 0.95 in order to make managing multiple directories more straightforward. You can create an RPROJ file in a new directory or an existing directory that already has R code and data. You can also create the project file by cloning a version control repository, such as Git or Subversion.
NOTE: The file extension used by an RStudio project appears as ".Rproj". You can double-click the RPROJ file to directly open the project.
